text: Emerson Fittipaldi (born December 12, 1946 in S찾o Paulo, Brazil) is a highly successful Brazilian automobile racing driver. He has won championships in both Formula One, and CART. Fittipaldi won the Indianapolis 500 twice. ==Early life== Emerson Fittipaldi was born in S찾o Paulo, Brazil. He is the younger son of prominent Italian-Brazilian motorsports journalist and radio commentator Wilson Fittipaldi Sr and his wife J처zefa "Juzy" Wojciechowska, an immigrant from Saint Petersburg, Russia and of Polish and Russian descent. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian Formula One drivers Category:Racecar drivers from S찾o Paulo
